data.title: Interpreters Directory
data.meta_description: AIIC | version of 11.03 with countries and languages in French
data.text:
AIIC Interpreters Directory

Find the best professional conference interpreter for the job

Use this Directory of all AIIC members to find the interpreter with the language combination you require, in the location you desire. You have the option to search by Language Pairs – the languages from which and into which you need interpreting (you may enter up to 5 pairs to narrow your search) – or by Language Combination, using AIIC’s A-B-C system (you may enter up to 2 A languages, 2 B languages and 5 C languages to narrow your search). The parameters selected on the Search page will be displayed at the very top of the results screen.

Additionally, you can search for interpreters by name or by location (either in English or as it is known locally), by membership or freelance/staff status. If you are looking for consultant interpreters – those who provide additional services such as organising interpreting teams – please use the Consultant Interpreters Directory

Troubleshooting

If you do not see any search results, try:

a) using a different browser, like Chrome or Firefox

b) disabling the popup blockers for https://aiic.org
